# Silindra Moonshadow

**Night Warden** | Eternal Guard

> *"The sun sees all. The moon sees what hides from the sun."*

| | |
|---|---|
| **Age** | 340 years |
| **Race** | High Elf, Female |
| **Role** | Night Watch Commander |
| **Reports To** | Captain Thandril Ironsong |
| **Location** | Crown District (sunset to sunrise) |

---

## Overview

Silindra Moonshadow commands the Eternal Guard's night watch—the 40 guards who protect the Crown from dusk to dawn. Night is when assassins prefer to strike, when magic is stronger, when dangers emerge. She has made the darkness her domain.

---

## Personality & Approach

Calm, observant, comfortable in shadow. Prefers moonlight to torchlight; claims it shows more truth. Leads night patrols personally despite her rank. Has developed an almost supernatural awareness of movement in darkness. Sleeps during the day, lives at night.

---

## Key Facts

- Has commanded night watch for 180 years
- Caught two assassins through pure intuition (no warning signs)
- Trains guards in night-fighting techniques
- Has not seen sunlight voluntarily in decades

---

## Secret (DM Only)

She's developing darkvision beyond normal elven ability—a side effect of centuries in darkness. She's not sure if it's magical or physical. She hasn't told anyone because she doesn't want to be studied. It makes her better at her job. That's enough.

---

## Connections

- **Thandril Ironsong**: Commander - Reports at dawn/dusk transitions
- **Caelorn Sunblade**: Counterpart - Day Warden, professional respect
- **Velindor Shadowmere**: Professional - Night is when his agents move too
